import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import api from "../../services/api"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../header/header"; import './home.css' const Home = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { const fetchProducts = async () => { try { const response = await api.get("/products"); setProducts(response.data.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching products:", error); } }; fetchProducts(); }, []); const addToCart = async (productId) => { try { await api.post("/cart", { productId, quantity: 1 }); alert("Added to cart!"); } catch (error) { alert(error.response?.data?.msg || "Failed to add to cart."); } }; return (
